code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{useEffect}from'react';var BusketSlice=createSlice({name:'Busket',initialState:{value:[]},reducers:{updateStore:function updateStore(state,store){state.value=store.payload;},addProduct:function addProduct(state,obj){state.value.push(obj.payload);},removeProduct:function removeProduct(state,id){state.value=state.value.filter(function(product){return product.id!==id.payload;});},countPlus:function countPlus(state,id){state.value=state.value.map(function(product){if(product.id!==id.payload){return product;}else{product.count++;return product;}});},countMinus:function countMinus(state,id){state.value=state.value.map(function(product){if(product.id!==id.payload){return product;}else{product.count--;return product;}});}}});var _BusketSlice$actions=BusketSlice.actions,updateStore=_BusketSlice$actions.updateStore,addProduct=_BusketSlice$actions.addProduct,removeProduct=_BusketSlice$actions.removeProduct,countPlus=_BusketSlice$actions.countPlus,countMinus=_BusketSlice$actions.countMinus;export{updateStore,addProduct,removeProduct,countPlus,countMinus};export default BusketSlice.reducer;
